ygData.subject: Song of Twilight
ygData.msgSnippet: I just dinged 53 Friday night.  I scribed SoT and started using it and WOW! ItÔÇÖs amazing.  IÔÇÖve used it in the Karnor Dog Tower, against Raptors and
ygData.messageBody:
I just dinged 53 Friday night. I scribed SoT and started using it and WOW!
It┬Æs amazing. I┬Æve used it in the Karnor Dog Tower, against Raptors and
Vicious Raptors in Timorous Deep and at the zone in Chardok.

This song really changes things for me. I feel like I did at 32 ┬û getting a
new song that really increased my capability and group-ability. Unlike
others ┬û I┬Æve found Pixie to be too resistant to be usable. Keeping 2 mobs
parked now is trivial. The resists were rare ┬û me or anyone else getting
hit was even rarer. I don┬Æt have to worry about post-rez mana shortage for
crowd control.

I had a group with 2 Druids, 2 Paladins and myself at the zone out in
Chardok. We had little difficulty. We had a 59 monk soloing ┬û he was
┬ôPersonality Challenged┬ö and through a fit because we complained about him
training us by pulling through us because he was there first. He got mad
because his pull through us started hitting my group so I mezzed it <g>

There was a large guild raiding there ┬û and went bad after they tried to
take the Queen down. A good buddy 56 Shaman hung out with us while he
waited on his CR ┬û and initially thought we were ┬ôCrazy┬ö to fight there
without a Cleric. He through us some nice buffs and slowed the mobs for us
while he waited ┬û which rocked ┬û but we kicked butt before and after. This
was with a five man group.

Eventually a third Druid came and one of the Pallies had to leave. Shortly
thereafter ┬û we had a 2 pull and a third wandered in. I was able to keep
the two parked indefinitely without any problems. But the mob left (forget
which type of Sarnak it was) was a Cleric or Shaman ┬û and dotted the tank
and healed itself. Ironically ┬û we were able to keep the extras down ┬û but
couldn┬Æt kill the single one fast enough with only the one tank. (Druid DOT
┬Æs were resisted etc)

Slyde Katzenjammer
53 Bard
Order of Norrath
Xegony
